description.displayText: Rene has been volunteering as a mentor to adolescents and teens for many years. Because I work in the place where he volunteers, I hear from these youth often about how much they appreciate Rene. His consistency, warmth, and openness make young people feel safe and understood. He is dependable and kind, and takes the time to build authentic, secure relationships. He is also creative and a lot of fun! He'd be a great fit for kids who love music, being active, and getting outside.
description.originalText: Rene has been volunteering as a mentor to adolescents and teens for many years. Because I work in the place where he volunteers, I hear from these youth often about how much they appreciate Rene. His consistency, warmth, and openness make young people feel safe and understood. He is dependable and kind, and takes the time to build authentic, secure relationships. He is also creative and a lot of fun! He'd be a great fit for kids who love music, being active, and getting outside.

description.displayText:
Rene and I have known each other for years, since my daughter was 7. He has always been a shining star in her life, always taking to time to have real conversations with her, as well as carving time out to do the things that she'd enjoy the most.

If I still lives in Texas Rene would still be one of the handful of go-to's I relied on.
